Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I've noticed that commercial AI services tend to not always be accurate, which is why I trust my lecturers or tutors more when it comes to feedback.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Feedback from GenAI doesn't 'hurt' as much as feedback from tutors or lecturers as they tend to be neutral when it comes to delivery.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Sometimes, feedback from GenAI can be unhelpful and inaccurate. And while the same can happen with lecturers/tutors, I find it easier to trust feedback from them as they will be grading the assessment anyways.
